conversation.message: That is an excellent question, Seeker D. We structure our core teams to be small and highly collaborative—typically 4-6 members—ensuring every individual has significant ownership and visibility. Mentorship is integrated directly into the workflow: every new hire is paired with a dedicated senior mentor immediately, meeting weekly for structured guidance and daily for on-the-job support. Furthermore, professional development isn't just an annual review topic; we allocate significant time and budget for continuous learning, including access to specialized courses and conferences, ensuring your skills evolve alongside our cutting-edge projects. We view development as a core function, not an add-on. Are there any particular skills or technologies you are hoping to specialize in next?
